documentation.text: @notice Event when an user deposit tokens in the pool
@notice Event when an user withdraw tokens from the pool
@notice Event when a loan is started
@notice Event when a loan is ended
@notice (Admin) Event when the contract admin is updated
@notice (Admin) Event when the contract controller is updated
@notice Event when an user deposit tokens in the pool
@notice Event when an user withdraw tokens from the pool
@notice Event when a loan is started
@notice Event when a loan is ended
@notice (Admin) Event when the contract admin is updated
@notice (Admin) Event when the contract controller is updated

CloseLoan(address,uint256,address).notice: Event when a loan is ended

Deposit(address,uint256,address).notice: Event when an user deposit tokens in the pool

NewBorrow(address,uint256,address).notice: Event when a loan is started

Withdraw(address,uint256,address).notice: Event when an user withdraw tokens from the pool

newAdmin(address,address).notice: (Admin) Event when the contract admin is updated

newController(address,address).notice: (Admin) Event when the contract controller is updated
